name: INUpdateMediaAffinityMediaItemResolutionResult
desc: A resolution result for updating the user’s affinity for a media item.

items.name: init(mediaItemResolutionResult: INMediaItemResolutionResult)
items.desc: Creates a result that involves successfully updating the user’s affinity for a media item.

items.name: class func successes(with: [INMediaItem]) -> [INUpdateMediaAffinityMediaItemResolutionResult]
items.desc: Creates an array of resolution results based on a set of media items you provide.

items.name: class func unsupported(forReason: INUpdateMediaAffinityMediaItemUnsupportedReason) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a result that requires the user to confirm the request, because your is unable to support the current request.

items.name: enum INUpdateMediaAffinityMediaItemUnsupportedReason
items.desc: Reasons the app can’t update the user’s affinity for the media item.
